config.cursedloot:title: Cursed Loot Config
cursedloot:destroycurse.lore: Destroys 1 item curse in direction shown when placed.
cursedloot:remainhidden.lore: Item remains hidden while currently in the wild.
cursedloot:toporbottom.lore: Item must be placed at the top or bottom of bag.
cursedloot:destroyitem.lore: Destroys 1 Item in direction shown upon returning to Town.
cursedloot:leftorright.lore: Item must be placed to the left or right of bag.
cursedloot:itembecomesthis.lore: Item in direction shown becomes this Item upon returning to Town.
cursedloot:itemtoshop.lore: Immediately sends Item in the direction shown to your base chest.
cursedloot:hitsbreaksitem.lore: Item breaks if you receive too many hits.
cursedloot:hitstaken.lore: %d hits have been received since getting the item.
cursedloot:hidden.item.revealed: §cSecret item has revealed itself upon you.
